document_data.name: Aurae Shaeremae
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Aurae Shaeremae''' was an [[elf]] of House [[Shaeremae]] in [[Cormanthor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|241}}, she attended a revel where [[Elminster]] substituted [[Coronal]] [[Eltargrim Irithyl]]. Her husband, [[Qildor Rewen]], spoke for the two of them.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|199|10}}
